item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Yeah, I missed the point of your comment.... maybe you care to explain?
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I missed the point of your comment…. maybe you care to explain?

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: I was expecting more of you...

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Are you aware about this habit that people have to buy a T shirt and then send a photo of themselves wearing it?
http://www.thinkgeek.com/tshirts/frustrations/388b/action/20fe6b0/
item.content:encoded:
Are you aware about this habit that people have to buy a T shirt and then send a photo of themselves wearing it?

http://www.thinkgeek.com/tshirts/frustrations/388b/action/20fe6b0/

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: Nice. The English was easy, but the voice... was kind of broken. Anyway - the idea was clear, still I'll need you or one like you to help.
item.content:encoded:
Nice.
The English was easy, but the voice… was kind of broken.
Anyway – the idea was clear, still I’ll need you or one like you to help.
